messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Hello, New and confused./Potter & Shakespeare
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: 24hrmom **Did you notice that the witches in that scene are named The Weird Sisters?  It seemed familiar so I asked my daughter and sure enough,
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: 24hrmom

**Did you notice that the witches in that scene are named The Weird Sisters? It seemed familiar so I asked my daughter and sure enough, that's the name of the band that plays at the Yule Ball in Goblet of Fire. **

I didn't remember that from Goblet of Fire.

I wonder how many other connections there are like that.

I'm going to read them all again, once I'm done with Return of the King, (which I'm bound and determined to finish before the film comes out) I'll have to keep my eyes open for those references.

Cool!

Kelli~



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
